backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with user profiles, dental avatars, tasks, task completion, access control, and mixins for storage and authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to the new format by adding initials and profilePhoto fields while preserving other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for key frontend components and hooks used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling Internet Identity auth and routing to either login or the authenticated app flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Determines whether to show role choice, profile onboarding, fallback error UI, or the main app based on role and profile queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/FirstManage: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Provides a login UI where users select assistant or manager role, optionally enter a manager token, and triggers Internet Identity login with stored pending role data.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleChoiceS: Allows users to confirm their stored or selected role choice and submit it to the backend, including optional manager token handling.
frontend/src/components/avatars/avatarMa: Empty file placeholder for avatar-related manifest data.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarPi: Fetches, initializes, and displays selectable dental avatars with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/avatars/DentalAv: Renders an SVG dental avatar by ID or a placeholder if unavailable, encoding the SVG safely for display.
frontend/src/components/avatars/Generate: Generates a pastel-colored avatar SVG containing tooth art and user initials.
frontend/src/components/avatars/ProfileA: Displays a user's avatar by prioritizing photo, dental avatar, or generated initials-based avatar.
frontend/src/components/badges/badges.ts: Defines static badge metadata including IDs, translation keys, and icons.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeShel: Displays all badges in a slide-out shelf, highlighting earned ones and showing details.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Provides a full-page error display with retry support and translated messaging.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the main app header with logo, theme and language controls, user menu, badges, and settings.
Defines the main layout with header, tabs, and routing between tasks, overtime, and manager pages based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/layout/LanguageS: Dropdown button allowing users to switch between supported languages using i18n state.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button that toggles between light and dark themes via next-themes.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskAudi: Displays a table of completed tasks with user info, comments, and photo indicators.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskComp: Builds a bar chart summarizing how many tasks each user has completed.
frontend/src/components/manager/UserPick: Select dropdown for choosing a user, showing avatars and usernames.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabNa: Renders a tab bar allowing switching between sections based on activeTab state.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: Form for adding or subtracting overtime entries with validation and disabled backend action.
Lists overtime entries sorted by timestamp with visual indicators for additions and deductions.
Calculates and displays total overtime minutes and equivalent workdays.
frontend/src/components/profile/PrivacyP: Privacy settings panel enabling data export, local data clearing, and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for initial profile setup allowing username, initials, avatar selection, and optional photo upload with progress tracking and save handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: File input component for selecting, previewing, validating, and removing profile photos with optional upload progress display.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Settings panel for editing an existing user profile, managing avatars and photos, and updating or removing profile data.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CompleteTa: Dialog for completing a task with optional comment and before/after photo uploads, submitting data to the backend.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CreateTask: Dialog for creating a new task with title and type selection, handling validation and submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Card showing task details, completion status, related metadata, and a button to mark tasks as done.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Lists tasks sorted by completion status and priority, rendering them as TaskCards or showing an empty-state message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides queries to fetch the caller’s role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Computes earned badges from overtime entries and task completions.
frontend/src/hooks/useDentalAvatars.ts: Fetches dental avatars, initializes them if needed, and provides lookup by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Returns i18n context, ensuring it is used within the provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, state, and auth client creation with context.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerOvertime.ts: Empty placeholder for manager overtime hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerTasks.ts: Provides a disabled query for exporting task data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotify.ts: Simple notification wrapper with i18n‑aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOvertime.ts: Provides no‑op overtime hooks returning empty data for deprecated functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file referencing where feature‑specific hooks live.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleSelection.ts: Mutations to select assistant or manager roles, refreshing related authz queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: CRUD hooks for tasks, including creating, completing, and resetting tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching, saving, and modifying user profiles and photos.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: I18n provider storing language in localStorage and exposing translation lookup.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines language types and translation strings for English, Dutch, and French covering UI labels, tasks, overtime, manager sections, badges, and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, global styles, and adds float animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerDashbo: Manager dashboard with tabs for overtime management and task statistics.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerOverti: Manager view for selecting a user and viewing nonexistent overtime data with disabled CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerStatsP: Manager statistics page showing task charts and audit logs with CSV export capability.
frontend/src/pages/OvertimePage.tsx: Displays overtime form, totals, and history, showing a loading state while fetching entries.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Fetches tasks, resets recurring tasks on mount, and shows the task list with a dialog for creating new tasks.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Utility to convert data arrays to CSV and trigger file download in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, animations, plugins, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Holds the app’s current project state, including functional requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the FitGebit Team Tracker. Used as a master specification for authentication, roles, profiles, avatars, tasks, and exports.
